title: FS T202s POOR to VG Approx 50 Panels Great Chance (ALL CARDS SOLD)
author: batsballsbases

posts.post_title: FS T202s POOR to VG Approx 50 Panels Great Chance (ALL CARDS SOLD)
posts.post_content: Well here is the deal ! On a walkin to a friends store I was able to buy about 50 t202s. Thats the good news bad news is the condition is all over the place. from poor (taped together panels) to vg. Im not a  collector of these so here is a chance to maybe fill in some holes. Sorry no cobbs. But some stars a Mathewson/ Myers complete panel but stained +creased.(scan looks like its cut but it isnt) I would say none are trimmed just well worn. I have scanned all the cards about 7 to a page front and back.  Very hard to price these so I would rather that you guys make me an offer on them . For the sake of fairness Highest price will take it. I will consider if someone wants to make an offer on all of it. Great chance cut up the taped panels keep the others intact,its up to you!  If a small order 3.50 shipping  if larger I will cover it. Paypal gift is fine. Or other arangements. Email if intrested [url]asimeone@optonline.net[/url]. or pms. Sorry no trades. I will scan an individual card for you also and put it on here. Thanks Guys help me thin the herd! Sorry Guys It is what it is!
on 3 cards
w
Wow Guys hold on looks like 10 more are sold. All the taped ones are pending and Harry Lord at third tinker lennox is pending.

Ditto - thanks Al for a pleasant, no-nonsense transaction!  Love the t202's and I must say they look better in person than on scans (these were my first "full" t202s!)

Got mine yesterday.  Thanks.
got mine too. the triple folder gods are pleased :)
Al. This was a good deal. Got the cards and I must say the T202's are a great add to my collection. Thanks again.
Al - Got mine yesterday as well.  Thanks Again!  Kevin

Thanks Al...got mine yesterday.  Not to pile on, but Al is quite the collector's friend.  And even a bonus for the bits and pieces collector like myself...I strongly suggest you stumble into more of these finds!  It does the hobby good.

Brian

Guys Thanks for the purchases. Glad everyone was able to take something into thier collections. See what happens when the seller is not a collector of these!:D Good things happen. Well just waiting for Bob my double dip buyer to get the last package! Boy I wish someone would cut lose with some of the pins (that is what I collect) like this that would make me very happy. Guys a true pleasure and THANKYOU ALL.

Al,

Got my second batch in and they look great!  Hope your friend with the shop finds more cards!

thanks, its been a pleasure!

Bob
Guys Thanks again! Looks like my work is done here!:D:D

Al, 

I told my wife that I was going to seperate the Matty end panel & she thought I was nuts! I came home today to a great surprise... She framed and matted the t202! Its amazing what a $6 dollar frame (from Michaels) that is meant to display a dollar bill can do for a t202 beater! 

Thanks again! 
-Dave

Hi Dave,
You know you have a smart wife! When you told me that day we met that you were going to cut up the matty I just couldnt see it. On the taped ones Yes maybe but on that one I wouldnt have. But as it became yours to do what you wished with Im so glad your wife took it from you and did what she did. Believe me you will thank her many times over! Looks great in its new home. :D:D Keep in touch my friend!
